message: I've read that they are definitely healthier than those of us in the western world. OUR medicine, for the most part, is synthetic. Personally, I've used herbs and spices on a daily basis as just part of my normal life for decades. I'm 51, strong, and healthy...and not on any medications.
I beg to differ with you ,I have family in military, I know personally it has its own pollution! But ty for your opinion on the matter.

Mexico is not a bad place it depends what you do and who you hang with . . for me I've been to mexicali, Tijuana, guanajuato, Guadalajara, and many more places . . and there's nothing bad going on . . it disappoints me when I ask people have you been to Mexico and they reply no and I'll never go there . . it's scary or I'll get kidnapped by the cartel . . It depends who you know and what you do that causes that attention . . Mexico is a safe beautiful place. <ed> <ed> I'm proud to be 100% Latina <ed> <ed>

Trump says and does anything to get attention. Anyone who studies this guy knows that this was his plan years ago and he even talked about how to dominate the media. So he is constantly in the news and the other candidates are forced to talk about him a lot...so it sucks the air out of their ability to get a reasonable share of airtime....and when they do get it often they are on the defense. It is absolutely brilliant strategy...his actual reality TV experience preped him nicely for this. Only this time it is NOT reality TV...it is the Presidency of the US...not a game...not """"Your Fired""""...or who gets """"Kicked off the Island"""".
